customProperties.armorEffects: Whenever you fail a saving throw against a poison, paralysis, or petrified conditions the DC to save from the effect is reduced by 2 against that effect until it ends. You gain resistance to poison damage.
customProperties.weaponEffects: Poisons applied to this weapon are destroyed. In addition, any additional damage dealt by this weapon is converted into its damage type.

entries.name: Properties
entries: Armor Effects: Whenever you fail a saving throw against a {@condition poison}, {@condition paralysis}, or {@condition petrified} conditions the DC to save from the effect is reduced by 2 against that effect until it ends. You gain resistance to poison damage.
Weapon Effects: Poisons applied to this weapon are destroyed. In addition, any additional damage dealt by this weapon is converted into its damage type.
